about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey as a Prime, one of the most powerful beings in existence. In a
universe where the lines between science and magic blur, you’ll traverse through shattered dimensions, each teeming with ancient relics, dangerous foes, and untold secrets. Your mission: restore balance to a multiverse on the brink of chaos, and uncover the truth behind the malevolent force threatening to consume all realities.

Cosmic Prime: Dimensions offers visceral, fast-paced battles that demand both skill and quick thinking. Wield powerful relics and futuristic weaponry in tandem, switching between them to exploit enemy weaknesses. Every fight is an opportunity to test your mettle, with each victory bringing you closer to mastering the chaotic energies that permeate the multiverse. Whether you’re battling massive dimensional guardians or hordes of corrupted foes, every encounter is a test of your tactical prowess.

The heart of Cosmic Prime: Dimensions lies in its expansive campaign. Traverse through richly detailed dimensions, each one a unique realm filled with mysteries to unravel and challenges to conquer. As you progress, the story unfolds through cinematic cutscenes and immersive gameplay, revealing the dark forces at play and your role in restoring order. Each dimension presents new quests, enemies, and environments, ensuring that no two adventures are ever the same. Your journey is fraught with danger, but also with the promise of discovering the truth behind the multiverse’s collapse.

The path to victory lies not just in your skill, but in the power you wield. You’ll discover and craft ancient relics—artifacts imbued with both mystical and technological power. Infuse these relics with Essence, the energy that flows through all dimensions, to unlock devastating abilities and enhancements. Dual-wield these relics to create synergistic effects that can turn the tide of battle in your favor. Each relic is a key to overcoming the multiverse’s challenges, and the right combination can make you unstoppable.

As a Prime, you possess the unique ability to Chronoshift, allowing you to traverse alternate versions of the same dimension. Activate this power to explore parallel realities where the environment, enemies, and even the story itself take on new forms. Use the Chronoshift to your advantage, finding hidden pathways, unlocking powerful relics, and escaping from overwhelming odds. This ability not only adds depth to exploration but also introduces strategic layers to gameplay, as you decide when and how to use it to influence the outcome of your journey.

As you journey through the multiverse, you’ll encounter a diverse cast of characters—both allies and enemies—who shape your adventure. From the enigmatic Nexus, who guides you through the fractured dimensions, to the corrupted guardians who seek to stop you, each character has a story to tell and a role to play in the cosmic drama. Engage with them through meaningful interactions that influence the narrative and deepen your connection to the world. The relationships you build and the choices you make will echo across the dimensions, leaving a lasting impact on your journey.

In Cosmic Prime: Dimensions, no two playthroughs are ever the same. With its roguelite structure, the game offers endless replayability through procedurally generated levels that combine handcrafted rooms with randomized challenges. Each time you step into a dimension, you’ll face new enemies, discover different relics, and experience unique encounters. But even as the dimensions shift, your journey continues to push the narrative forward. Progression is persistent, with each run revealing more of the story, unlocking new abilities, and bringing you closer to unraveling the multiverse’s greatest mysteries. Every setback is an opportunity to grow stronger, making each playthrough a crucial step toward ultimate victory.

name: Cosmic Prime: Dimensions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th gen / AMD FX 8XXX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8th gen / Ryzen 7 1st gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX 590

short_description: Cosmic Prime: Dimensions offers a fast-paced, roguelite ARPG filled with thrilling combat and a deep, evolving story. Explore unique dimensions, defeat dynamic bosses, and wield powerful relics. Adapt and strategize in ever-changing environments to prevent an interdimensional catastrophe.
